alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 03 at 8:15PM CST until December 06 at 1:48AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Attala and Holmes Counties. For the Big Black/Homochitto...including West, Bentonia, Bovina, Rosetta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Lowlands and agricultural land near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning and crest at 16.0 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Black River West 15.0 12.5 Sat 7 pm CST 16.0 13.4 10.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 815 AM CST.
